overview:
Startups and technology are my passion. I co-founded i-ask with the purpose to change the way people and companies give and get feedback on a daily basis. When I’m not working on i-ask, I’ve been working with my co-founder developing mobile apps, and working on a new crowdfunding platform for gamers. I enjoy working in the mobile space and plan to develop additional platforms and games in the future.

In my last role, I spent several years managing a multi-million dollar medical device distribution in New England. I worked with orthopedic and sports medicine surgeons, throughout New England, and took a territory in VT to consecutive growth year over year.

Prior to medical devices I managed several physical therapy practices located in Burlington VT. All of these experiences have prepared me for the current task ahead, developing a startup and disrupting the survey world while taking feedback to the mobile platform.
